alert.note: Alert for Sangamon (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 2:28AM CDT until August 02 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Sangamon County in central Illinois... * Until 315 AM CDT. * At 228 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Williamsville, or 12 miles north of Springfield, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sherman, Riverton, Williamsville, Spaulding and Dawson. This includes the following highways... Interstate 55 between mile markers 104 and 111. Interstate 72 between mile markers 110 and 112. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
